trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo" /> class defines key transport recipient information.

*Key transport* algorithms typically use the RSA algorithm, in which an originator establishes a shared cryptographic key with a recipient by generating that key and then transporting it to the recipient.
This is in contrast to *key agreement* algorithms, in which the two parties that will be using a cryptographic key both take part in its generation, thereby mutually agreeing to that key.
This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não tem um construtor público; Portanto, ele não pode ser publicamente instanciado.

trans-unit.source: It is a read-only class accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: É uma classe somente leitura acessível a partir de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo.EncryptedKey" /> property retrieves the encrypted key for this key transport recipient.
An array of byte values that represents the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de valores de byte que representa a chave criptografada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo.KeyEncryptionAlgorithm" /> property retrieves the key encryption algorithm used to encrypt the content encryption key.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier" /> object that stores the key encryption algorithm identifier.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier" /> objeto que armazena o identificador de algoritmo de criptografia de chave.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo.RecipientIdentifier" /> property retrieves the subject identifier associated with the encrypted content.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier" /> object that stores the identifier of the recipient taking part in the key transport.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier" /> objeto que armazena o identificador do destinatário que fazem parte do transporte de chaves.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo.Version" /> property retrieves the version of the key transport recipient.
The version of the key transport recipient is automatically set for objects in this class, and the value implies that the recipient is taking part in a key transport algorithm.
An int value that represents the version of the key transport <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa a versão do transporte chave <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The version determines whether the message in which this <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo> is contained is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message.
trans-unit.target: A versão determina se a mensagem no qual este <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo> contido é uma mensagem de PKCS #7 ou uma sintaxe de mensagem criptográfico (CMS).

trans-unit.source: CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
trans-unit.target: CMS é um superconjunto mais recente do PKCS #7.
